summary: Leah's (Holly Marie Combs) surprise enrollment in a conflict management class pushes her to develop friendship, love and inner strength.
cast: Holly Marie Combs|Ben Bass|Corbin Bernsen|Catherine Disher|Randal Edwards|Amanda Brugel|Tammy Isbell|Paula Rivera|Sherry Miller|R.H. Thomson|Precious Chong|Brad Borbridge|Jim Annan|Alysia Topol|Claire Calarco|Carrie Schiffler|Michael Barbuto|Michael Vincent Dagostino|Corey Pascall|Greg Tremblay|Michael Cleland|Douglas E. Davidson|Yvonne E. Davidson
title: El amor es complicado
